name: Hurricane: Rush
description:
An absolutely blistering sensation of speed lies at the core of this intriguing mash-up of action game and infinite runner. As you guide your fighter plane toward the horizon by swiping to steer, you have to whip around incoming german bombers and snare care packages to stay alive. Some sessions are over in seconds, some triumphantly stretch into minutes. Spare, modern graphics set the perfect mood as you inevitably become obsessed with zooming just a little bit farther on your next run.

Watch the world blast by you in your solar powered glider and try to keep pace with the setting sun, while avoiding deadly collisions further and further into a strange and dangerous landscape.
Upgrade your ship by completing challenges and learn to adapt to a world that changes daily. Compete on local and global leaderboards against friends and the world... but in the end the sun always wins.

Note:
This game runs smoothly on these devices:
- iPhone SE, iPhone 6 and up
- iPad pro (2nd gen & 3rd gen)

Coming in the next update:
- Customize your ship with attachments like faster turning and decals.
- Unlock new levels.
